system.requirements:
Tier 2; Clues from the Crowds, Fellowship 35
Aptitudes: Fellowship, Social
system.effect: When employing the Shadowing special use of the Stealth Skill, Character can use their Fellowship Characteristic instead of Agility.

description.value: When employing the Shadowing special use of the Stealth Skill, Character can use their Fellowship Characteristic instead of Agility.
